about_the_game:
Warning: This DLC contains sexually explicit content! It is intended only for adults aged 18 or over and contains content that some players may find offensive.

You will experience:
Exquisite adult videos, after adding this DLC, all the pictures in the album will be modified into adult videos
Adult content scenes with various girls, including full nudity, sex, etc.
The subject matter, content, and form of this work are all fictitious creations. Any similarity is purely coincidental. The fictional pornographic content in the content is for leisure and entertainment purposes only. Please do not imitate it.
All characters in the game are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 years old to play the game

Game background:
You have just joined 100% Hotel. Joy is a popular person in the underground dance party. She is very beautiful and takes good care of you.
She and Ovie have a very good relationship, and they often get tired of being together, but recently, because of you, the two have begun to show signs of loosening up.
You just occasionally dance, chat, and hold hands with Joy for a drink.
"Oh, I really didn't expect Sister Ovie to be really angry..."
"...don't pay attention to her"

​

name: Joy Life 3 - adult patch
short_description: Joy Life 3 is still a casual flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated.
